text: Phobia is a 1980 Canadian American horror thriller directed by John Huston and starring Paul Michael Glaser, Susan Hogan, Patricia Collins, John Colicos, David Eisner, Alexandra Stewart. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1980 horror movies Category:1980 thriller movies Category:1980s horror thriller movies Category:Canadian horror movies Category:Canadian thriller movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:Movies directed by John Huston Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Phobia (1980 movie)
